description: Shared Services Canada has a requirement for the provision and operation of Starlink Low Earth Orbitng 2-way satellite communication services as provided ...
full_summary:
**Starlink Satellite Services Tender Announcement**

**Reference Number:** SSC-23-00022696:T
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** May 5, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** May 23, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time

**Procurement Details:**

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites interested parties to provide and operate Starlink Low Earth Orbiting 2-way satellite communication services on an as-and-when required basis. The services will be used by SSC and its partner organizations/clients for semi-permanent/fixed land applications, as well as potential aeronautical, land mobile, and maritime applications. The Starlink services feature high-speed, low-latency, shared capacity service plans with priority access, global coverage, including Canada's northern and coastal regions.

**Key Features:**

* High-speed, low-latency, shared capacity service plans with priority access
* Global coverage, including Canada's northern and coastal regions
* Utilizes Ku-band for the user link and Ka-Band for the feeder link
* Internet connectivity between Starlink point-of-presence(s) (PoP) and end-user locations

**Contracting Entity:**

* Shared Services Canada (SSC)
* Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 5B6, Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Nathalie Houle, Contracting Officer
* Email: [Nathalie.m.Houle@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:Nathalie.m.Houle@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 613-301-5101
* Fax: 613-960-6007

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is covered under the following Trade Agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Attachments:**

Documents related to this tender can be downloaded from:

https://sscp2pspc
